LuaScriptableCreationWindow
EditorWindow
public
LuaScriptableCreationWindow

A custom editor window to create LUA Scriptable objects.

Variables
selectedTypeIndex
private int selectedTypeIndex

The index of the selected LUA template type.

luaTemplateTypes
private List<Type> luaTemplateTypes
luaTemplateTypeNames
private List<string> luaTemplateTypeNames
verticalScrollPosition
private Vector2 verticalScrollPosition
currentTemplate
private LuaScriptable currentTemplate

The current LuaScriptable instance being edited.

Functions
ShowWindow
[MenuItem("Tools/Create LUA Scriptable")]
public static void ShowWindow()

Opens the LuaScriptableCreationWindow in the editor.

OnEnable
private void OnEnable()

Initializes the window with the available LuaScriptable types.

OnGUI
private void OnGUI()

Renders the editor window's GUI elements.

OnGUI

Renders the currentTemplate's GUI and closes the window if necessary.

OnDisable
private void OnDisable()

Sets the currentTemplate to null when the window is disabled.

UpdateCurrentTemplate
private void UpdateCurrentTemplate()

Updates the currentTemplate based on the selectedTypeIndex.
